languages.text: "Мы действительно стали ближе. И мне это нравится".

traits.locale_text: "Мы действительно стали ближе. И мне это нравится".

languages.text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."
languages.original_text: "Мы действительно стали ближе. И мне это нравится".

traits.locale_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."
"We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."
"We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

"We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

languages.text: «Es verdad que ahora estamos más unidos. Eso me agrada».
languages.original_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

traits.locale_text: «Es verdad que ahora estamos más unidos. Eso me agrada».

languages.text: 「距離が縮まったようで、嬉しいです」
languages.original_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

traits.locale_text: 「距離が縮まったようで、嬉しいです」

languages.text: “我们确实变得更加亲密了，我很满意。”
languages.original_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

traits.locale_text: “我们确实变得更加亲密了，我很满意。”

languages.text: "Endlich stehen wir uns näher. Das freut mich."
languages.original_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich stehen wir uns näher. Das freut mich."

languages.text: « Nous sommes de plus en plus proches, et ce n'est pas pour me déplaire. »
languages.original_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes de plus en plus proches, et ce n'est pas pour me déplaire. »

languages.text: "Kesinlikle daha da yakınlaştık. Bu beni memnun ediyor."
languages.original_text: "We have certainly become closer. This pleases me."
